_comment: For Top K apps, should be able to choose chart type
name: top-k-app-chart
title: Top 15 Big Time Application

series.query: select appname, min(agg_perf_MB) as min_jobsize, avg(agg_perf_MB) as avg_jobsize, max(agg_perf_MB) as max_jobsize, sum(total_bytes) as total_bytes, sum(runtime) as runtime, sum(iotime) as iotime from jobs_info group by appname order by max_jobsize desc limit 15;
